item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 at 3:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Tiny Glade 'built' its way to >600k sold in a month (89 points | 13 comments)
2. Webvm: Virtual Machine for the Web (15 points | 2 comments)
3. SpaceX Super Heavy splashes down in the gulf, canceling chopsticks landing (138 points | 183 comments)
4. Using Erlang hot code updates (158 points | 33 comments)
5. Open Riak – open, modern Riak fork (139 points | 41 comments)
6. Tiling with Three Polygons Is Undecidable (38 points | 7 comments)
7. Fair coins tend to land on the side they started (331 points | 161 comments)
8. Nominal for Storing, Structural for Manipulating (3 points | 1 comment)
9. Using uv with PyTorch (67 points | 12 comments)
10. Show HN: Physically accurate black hole simulation using your iPhone camera (233 points | 94 comments)
11. GroMo (YC W21) Is Hiring ( | hide)
12. Is the 80 character line limit still relevant? (2008) (53 points | 124 comments)
13. Bottles of OOP now available in Python (105 points | 18 comments)
14. Query Your Python Lists (6 points | 1 comment)
15. Hand Tracking for Mouse Input (147 points | 31 comments)
16. Apple Confirms Zero-Day Attacks Hitting macOS Systems (95 points | 39 comments)
17. OpenStreetMap's New Vector Tiles (365 points | 134 comments)
18. Why I hate the index finger (1980) (144 points | 62 comments)
19. When did estimates turn into deadlines? (186 points | 130 comments)
20. PaCMAP: Large-Scale Dimension Reduction with Both Global and Local Structure [pdf] (9 points | discuss)
21. The Analog Thing: Analog Computing for the Future (76 points | 21 comments)
22. Meta Uses LLMs to Improve Incident Response (6 points | discuss)
23. Call for Developer Projects (12 points | 1 comment)
24. The Data Engineering Handbook (95 points | 8 comments)
25. Why is Apple Rosetta 2 fast? (2022) (131 points | 54 comments)
26. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (546 points | 302 comments)
27. Shift Left Is the Tip of the Iceberg (137 points | 74 comments)
28. Show HN: Rust library for numerical integration of real-valued functions (109 points | 40 comments)
29. A joke in approximating numbers raised to irrational powers (82 points | 32 comments)
30. Developing a D-20 Watch for Tabletop Roleplaying Games (69 points | 22 comments)
